text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock I don’t really understand your gripe, if it had been a BLM protest in Parliament then that, I take it, would of been fine.  Matt Hancock has already had Coronavirus & so too could the others in this picture.  Your constant government bashing is making you sound very bitter....
